title: Travian map.sql snapshots
subtitle: Travian map.sql daily snapshots.
description:
Travian snapshots (map.sql) collelected in a daily basis.
You could read this post by Travian team about the content of the file https://support.travian.com/en/support/solutions/articles/7000092469-what-is-map-sql-and-how-can-you-use-it-in-travian-legends-

I will try to maintain a table mapping the tribe value with the corresponding tribe name in the game.
